message_catalog:
Alert Alerts can be customized Asset Asset Monitor DC Data_Center HW Hardware Health Percentile Health Score Metric NS Name Service OT Other Percentile Projected Quota SAAS SS Score See asset configuration for details Server Farm Software as a Service (SAAS) VH VM Virtual Host (VH) Virtual Machine (VM) passed alert threshold server farm
hf_assets.last_modified last_modified_def created created_def qal_product_id qal_customer_id label label_def One word reference aka a name, sku, or readable id. Must be unique. might be domain, machine name etc name name_def A title or pretty version of label. Spaces allowed. template_id template_id_def If a template, this is the original f_id reference. f_id F_ID f_id_def Asset internal reference. templated_p_def Answers question. Is this asset originally derived from a template? template_p_def Is this asset a template? time_start_def Became/becomes active time_stop_def Time expires. op_status Operational status op_status_def trashed_p_def Is this item trashed? flags_def Custom flags monitor_p monitor_p_def Actively monitor asset? publish_p_def Publish publishable info about this asset? triage_priority_def Triage priority in case of limited resource allocation.
type_id_def See asset_type_id asset_type_id An asset or attribute type: vm vh dc hw ss ip etc.
hf_asset_type_features feature_type_def Short name for feature description_def A one line description.
hf_ns_records active_p_def Answers question. Is this active? name_record_def A domain name. time_created_def When record was created. time_trashed_def When record was trashed. hf_data_centers affix_def Short reference for data center description_def one line description (change to name)
hf_hw system_name_def hw system name backup_sys description_def one line description (change to name) details_def detail info
hf_vm domain_name_def A domain name. First one of a VM is primary domain name. type_id_def (change to server_type) resource_path_def resource pathname mount_union_def TBD
hf_ni os_dev_ref_def Operating System Device Reference bia_mac_address_def Burned In Address (MAC address) ul_mac_address_def Universal/Local programmed (non_OUI) MAC address ipv4_addr_range_def IPV4 Address Range ipv6_addr_range_def IPV6 Address Range
hf_ip ipv4_addr_def IPV4 Address ipv6_addr_def IPV6 Address ipv4_status_def Status of IPV4 interface represented as an integer. 0 down. 1 up. ipv6_status_def Status of IPV6 interface represented as an integer. 0 down. 1 up.
hf_os brand_def Brandname version_def Version reference kernel_def Kernel reference oprhaned_p Answers question. Is this no longer officially supported? requires_upgrade_p_def Answers question. Does this need an upgrade?
hf_vm_quotas plan_id_def Unique plan identifier description_def (change to name) base_storage_def Maximum quantity measured at base rate. See storage_unit for units of quantity. base_traffic_def Maximum quantity measured at base rate. See traffic_unit for units of quantity. base_memory_def Maximum quantity measured at base_rate. See memory_unit for units of quantity. base_sku_def Reference to pricing sku for minimum price of plan_id. over_storage_sku_def Reference to sku for pricing over base storage rate of plan_id. over_traffic_sku_def Reference to sku for pricing over base traffic rate of plan_id. over_memory_sku_def Reference to sku for pricing over base memory rate of plan_id. storage_unit_def The unit used for measuring storage. traffic_unit_def The unit used for measuring traffic. memory_unit_def The unit used for measuuring memory. qemu_memory_def TBD status_id_def Status of plan (change to plan_status) vm_type_def TBD (values are 1 or 2..) max_domain_def Maximum domains assignable to one of this plan. private_vps TBD.
hf_vhosts
